title: Adult ESL & GED in Philadelphia
name: Adult ESL & GED in Philadelphia
description:
A Map by Toddm

A map of sites in Philadelphia, PA, and the surrounding region, offering free ESL, GED, or ABE classes for adults, along with contact information for the agencies providing the service.

properties.name: Adult ESL Class at Calvary Vision Church
properties.description: Posted by Toddm550 E. Township Line Rd., Suite 200, Blue Bell, PA 19422Intermediate Class: Tuesdays, 7pm to 9pm Beginner class: Thursdays, 7pm to 9pm. Tel: 267-973-7276 Email: mrwonjlee@yahoo.com
